Posts.Content: LloydBraun wrote: Good morning to all, My wife has been recently diagnosed with BC, and now we are in shock mode because she is only 38. What is the time frame for early detection? She has had a lump for 3-4 months and there are lumps in the lymph nodes. I am just uncertain as to what the timeframe is for "early detection" since the breast tissue in younger women can allegedly hide cancer due to its firmer nature. I am hoping someone can fill me in. Greatly appreciated... thanks in advance. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What is early detection?? HELP! LloydBraun maryannecb
